About.title: About me
About.description:
I’m a software developer with over 2 years of experience, specialized in <highlight>Frontend Development</highlight>. As a Full Stack Developer, I love solving real-world problems through software that enhances lives or businesses. 

 I’m passionate about being involved in a product’s lifecycle <italic>—from its inception to its evolution—</italic> ensuring it delivers true value and impact.

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.description: Discover my journey through various companies in software development and teaching, from startups to established tech enterprises.

cloudLegion.title: Cloud Legion
cloudLegion.description: I contributed to the design and development of <main>Full Stack software</main> solutions, working with <second>Javascript</second> and technologies like <second>NextJS</second>, <second>Redux</second>, <second>TailwindCSS</second>, <second>ExpressJS</second> and <second>NodeJS</second>. Our team utilized tools such as <second>Docker</second>, <second>Sentry.io</second>, and <second>CI/CD</second> pipelines on <second>Azure</second> to ensure high-quality and secure code. Additionally, we collaborated closely with the client's team, providing <main>training and tech talks</main> on the newly implemented technologies, their functionality, and usage. We also helped them adopt Scrum and deliver sprint demos.

musure.title: MUSURE world
musure.description: At MUSURE, a startup dedicated to creating innovative digital solutions, we developed a click-to-earn game and a 3D content creation tool designed to help content creators monetize their work. Contributing to both <main>Frontend and Backend</main> development, we used technologies like <second>JavaScript</second>, <second>React</second>, <second>Redux</second>, <second>TailwindCSS</second>, <second>NodeJS</second>, <second>Firebase</second> and <second>Moralis</second>. We collaborated closely with UX/UI and economics teams under the Scrum methodology, tackling challenges related to cryptocurrency integration and <second>Web3</second>.

henry.title: Henry
henry.description: I <main>supported new students</main> by guiding them through real-time <second>JavaScript</second> challenges and instructing them in <second>GIT</second> flow to prepare them for the bootcamp. I also collaborated on improving the bootcamp entry procedures.
